column2: I saved room for the pastries as well. The hazelnut croissant brioche was a clear favorite. Perfectly charming
column3: this decadent gem of soft bread and oozing hazelnut chocolate stayed on my mind until I got another one. The fruit croissant was also fantastic
column4: and I liked that the powdered sugar and fruit jelly wasn't overbearing or detracting from the perfect bread. I plan to go back for macarons
column5: as they all looked great as well.
